title: Match me this vvedding. Or, A health that was drunke in sider and perrie. And good strong beere to, which did make the lads mery To a new court tune.
author: J. S.
publisher: for Tho: Lambert at the signe of the Hors-shoe in Smithfield,
notes: Verse - "Of late there was a wedding,".
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
